TopicTitle: Colons [and other special characters] not allowed in campaign names

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win 10, updated | CPU: Intel 37900k | GPU: AMD 7900xt | RAM: 64gig

 

A minor quibble, but this was solved in KSP, it's an easy fix.  I wanted to have a colon in the name, for example:    

"KSP 2: For Science" (without the quotes) and it wasn't allowed

Edited December 20, 2023 by Spicat
